column5: hmm, must just be you. go to your rogers page, you can select individual channels, costs $2.50 per month for WFN only

hmm, must just be you. go to your rogers page, you can select individual channels, costs $2.50 per month for WFN only    It shows up on the Guide for me too.  But is will show a 'no longer available' message if I try to select the channel.
I called Rogers already and they said "contract done for this WFN channel" . I am so lost now and I watched this channel everyday.
I was told that Rogers and WFN could not come to an agreement during their renewal and Rogers decided not to carry it.
I have Cogeco in Hamilton( partially owned by Rogers )and still had WFN as of this morning.  I hope it stays.  I have it on nearly 24/7.  It's great, even if only for background.

We all recall Shaw and rogers posting ads "FX not available on Bell" (is now) so maybe that's a new marketing plan for the Sat companies then to have new customers.  Duno but they had negative ads in the past so why not bring them back up (with WFN of course) to win some new tv customers.
Bell Fibe you have to get the BE$T package to get it or add it on as a $ingle Channel

Bell Fibe you have to get the BE$T package to get it or add it on as a $ingle Channel You can get ANY package and add it for $4.  Why pay for best when not needed?  You can add any channel to any package.  EG: Good + WFN = happy with rate and what you want.  Right?  Why pay for best when not needed for the 1 channel?
It is also available on the " Made In Canada IPTV "   addon for Kodi
I love that network

I miss the days of Red Fisher and Babe Winkleman. Now Red he was one crazy skilled angler and TV personality all in one. His favorite saying on the water was "Pass me the Crown my friend". I remember the one show he staggered into the camp fire. They must have not had enough bucks to pay someone to edit it out because there it was in full Black and White for all to see. Babe and his wife nearly came to blows one episode when he had one too many Old Milwaukie. She always had a spot at the end of the show demonstrating to all the "ladies" how to cook your man a great meal. She was frying Crappie and he said, "that's perfect because you are a crappy cook". I miss the days of TV when there was no such saying as politically correct.
WFN and wild tv are working again on cogeco

Bell Fibe you have to get the BE$T package to get it or add it on as a $ingle Channel  fibe is not available in my neighbourhood, its all around me, but not in the little block im in  older homes as well, not new builds.  the fastest internet speed available to me from bell is 5mb/s......its brutal. with rogers im at 100mb/s and speed tests have me at 70mb/s down,15mb/s up  talked to rogers today as well via facebook and got this response  Hello, thanks for reaching out. Unfortunately, WFN is no longer available. Notifications were sent via bills: World Fishing Network (WFN) will no longer be available as a channel option as of June 1, 2017. If you subscribe to WFN as part of a Customer Choice Package with a Pick 5, 10, 15, 20 or 30 option or subscribe to the Mix Pack (15, 20, or 30), WFN will be automatically replaced with one of the following channels to maintain your current discount: ESPN Classic Canada, Cottage Life or BBC Canada. Don’t worry if you already have one of these channels or prefer another selection, simply call us at 1-888-ROGERS1 and we’ll help you choose from over 100 channels in our Digital Specialty line-up at no extra charge. If you do not subscribe to WFN through the above options, we will stop charging you the monthly service fee of $2.79/mth plus taxes as of that date. All other aspects of your Rogers service(s) will remain the same. If you wish to respond to this notice or, if you have any questions, concerns or wish to modify, cancel or enhance your Customer Choice Package, please give us a call at 1-888-ROGERS1 or reach out to us via Facebook or Twitter.-

fibe is not available in my neighbourhood, its all around me, but not in the little block im in  older homes as well, not new builds.  the fastest internet speed available to me from bell is 5mb/s......its brutal. with rogers im at 100mb/s and speed tests have me at 70mb/s down,15mb/s up    My house was built in '52, we had the 5mb/s service from Bell for over ten years and their satelite TV . Changed to the fiber for both as soon as it was available, internet is faster and you can watch TV during rain and snow squalls
It is also available on the " Made In Canada IPTV "   addon for Kodi I think that add-on is dead!!!
I think that add-on is dead!!!  I just checked it out to be sure before I posted and there was Henry Wazchuk and the Skins and Fins Show with the WFN logo in the corner.

My house was built in '52, we had the 5mb/s service from Bell for over ten years and their satelite TV . Changed to the fiber for both as soon as it was available, internet is faster and you can watch TV during rain and snow squalls  we had fibe at our old place, it was great! funny part is, when i called bell and told i was cancelling, i said that they couldn't touch what rogers is bringing, when i told them what that was, the guy just yep, you're right, but Fibe is schedualed to be put in your neighbourhood by the fall.........that was 2 years ago, still no fibe available here  not to mention the problems we had with bells billing service, but thats a topic for another thread

I phoned Rogers yesterday, as I have paid for WFN separately and not partof a package, and they told me they stopped carrying the station as of June 1st. Now I have to make sure that they no longer bill me for it.
Netflix now has some outdoor shows available. I also subscribe to Wild TV through Roku, not the best channel setup and lots of commercials, but it's got a few programs that I really enjoy.
FWIW I just checked at 8:40pm and they all work except OLN , but at standard definition.
YouTube uncut angling, best fishing show hands down   Or some guy called Vishuscirquel on Youtube
Yep he's good too!!!! Lotsa updates on that guys page!!!
Or some guy called Vishuscirquel on Youtube He's Ok but he has some coconut issues.
He's Ok but he has some coconut issues.  LOLOL.
The wold fishing network channel is gone and do U know why Rogers took this channel out? Any advise for other channel that I can see fishing show?
WFN is still going on my cable. Not with Rogers.
YouTube uncut angling, best fishing show hands down
WFN was free for the month of May
U know why Rogers took this channel out?  They must not believe in sport fishing and or eating meat, that's got to be it!!!
Carbon tv on my roku is pretty good
The Fish'n Canada Show
The wold fishing network channel is gone and do U know why Rogers took this channel out?   I think the official answer was low viewership.
I think the official answer was low viewership. Bull Rogers doesn't care about viewership only profits generated.

Bull Rogers doesn't care about viewership only profits generated. true but I bet the free preview is over hence why they cannot set it now. If it was me I'd have done something very simple and gone to the WFN site to see what was up...  But that's real easy to do...
Oh my, the site works!  http://www.worldfishingnetwork.com/
WFN was free for the month of May   Free is still too expensive for WFN.....
Free is still too expensive for WFN.....
I had it free for a month a short time ago and noticed The Musky Hunter was not part of the line-up anymore...that was disappointing
Bull Rogers doesn't care about viewership only profits generated. True, but the two are related.

Spoke to Rogers yesterday wondering why it was removed as I just looked over our bill... He said that they make changes to channel packages from time to time and WFN wasn't viewed as much as others...  I asked are they compensating anything of the channels missing from my Adventure Pkg I pay an additional 10.00/month for ??   Hope, nothing...    Welcome to Rogers.....

funny that a buddy   got a call from a person today and the caller changed over all his service's over to another company because of WFN.  So a $4 channel lost that company $200 a mth.  Makes for a great business case to drop it in my eyes...
I gave it up watching a year ago,think it was a package my wife liked a part of. Don't miss it a bit
I think the explosion of youtubers and vimeo channels the past 3ish years really took over and dominated vs cable channels...imo the content trumps anything on the cable channels
Looks like WFN and Wild tv are gone from Cogeca  Error code has been on all day  I'll have to call tomorrow as I lay rxtra for those 2 channels
100%.  you don't ​have to​ sit through 10 minutes of commercials​ to watch 5 minutes of watered down fishing that's really just another commercial lol

I canceled it 5 years ago. The kid on the phone said it's only $1.99 a month Sir, I told him that he wants to pay it for me I'll keep it otherwise cancel it. It was frustrating watching the crap on there. 30 minute TV commercials other than a few good ones like the "Tarpon Tour" then they stopped showing that. Al Linder was my Guru when I started fishing, when I saw his new series I wanted to cry, if I want religion I'll go to church or watch the 700 Club or call some of my in-laws.

I fished with Al. Funny thing, he doesn't talk about religion at all. We hit up 5 mile pre fishing for the fort Frances bass classic for hours.  Before that, I had met him a year or two prior at the bait shop, same scenario. He gave my son a box of brand new clackin raps for free.  He's an awesome guy. Never understood why his show ends the way it does???
It was maybe before he became reborn when you met him. I met him in T.O. 20 years ago and he sure wasn't religious then in the least, he sure didn't act like it.

That was about 7 years ago. He was already ranting on tv  He's keen to have a drink and a puff too.  But to be fair every "pro" I've fished with is.  It's like the pga but not quite as bad. Pga golfers, if your not a drug addict/alcoholic your outta the loop
